name: Subversive Signs
description:
This is my little entry for the One Game A Month Game Jam for July 2021.

Its not much since I didn't have a lot of time, but I tried to give an interesting spin on the theme and break the 4th wall a little ^^

Controls:

  • WASD: walk
  • Enter: interact

Music: https://opengameart.org/content/lines-of-code
